label: About Us
tagline: Quality-Checked Fashion Jewellery from the Heart of Andhra Pradesh
mission: To make beautiful, quality-assured fashion jewellery accessible to everyone — whether you visit our Chirala store or shop online.
storyTitle: Rooted in Chirala, Built on Trust
storyShort: Bhagyalakshmi Future Gold brings you quality-checked fashion jewellery. Based in Chirala, we personally inspect every piece before it reaches you.
storyLong: For years, customers in Chirala and across Bapatla district have trusted us for quality fashion jewellery. Now, we're bringing that same trust and quality to you online — so you can shop our curated collection from anywhere.
qualityProcess: Every piece of jewellery passes through our hands before it reaches yours. We personally quality-check each item for finish, durability, and design accuracy.
warranty: We provide warranty on specific items. Ask us about warranty coverage when you purchase — in-store or online.
